```{r libraries}
library(ggplot2)
library(HURDAT)
library(knitr)
library(purrr)
library(rrricanes)
library(rrricanesdata)
library(stringr)
library(tibble)
```

```{r gis_latest, message = FALSE}
gis <- flatten(gis_latest(verbose = FALSE))
```

```{r keys}
# Keys of existing storms
keys <- str_extract(names(gis), "(^[[:alpha:]]{2}[[:digit:]]{6})") |> 
  toupper() %>% 
  unique() %>% 
  .[complete.cases(.)]
```
